article.title: Boeing Supports Saudi F-15SA Radar
article.text: The Boeing Co., St. Louis, Missouri, has been awarded a $18,290,920 modification (14) to previously awarded contract F33657?01?D?0026?RJ80 for Royal Saudi Air Force AN/APG-63(V) 3 radar in F-15SA aircraft. Work will be performed predominantly at Forest, Mississippi, and is expected to be complete by March 31, 2017. This contract is 100 percent foreign military sales to Saudi Arabia. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
